about_the_game:
A Classic 4-Key Rhythm Game with a focus on replayabilty and enganging, fun new mechanics!
It's Easy to learn, but Hard to Master!

Focusing on the learning curve for players: Each level has 4 difficulties: Easy, Medium, Hard and Expert. Completing levels in Expert will give special rewards! Each OST also contains one level with a special difficulty: Demon! These are for the best of the best, and will grant very special rewards upon completion.

Focusing on customisation: The in-game HUD is customisable from the settings, allowing you to move each individual element wherever you want, change it to your liking! There are also skins! Unlock these by purchasing them with an in-game currency, earnable for free by playing the game!

Focusing on replayability: When completing a level, you will be awarded with a rank, the higher the rank, the more you earn for completing that level. Each rank is saved and forever viewable in the Main Menu, in addition: Arcade mode allows you to enter your name after completing the level, and save it to the local leaderboard, compete with your friends!

Focusing on content: This game will constantly be updated with more levels, OST's and mechanics as time goes on, so the fun never runs out!

name: Circular Fever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770S
  • Graphics: Intel Intergrated Graphics Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Classic 4-Key Rhythm Game - Easy to Learn, Hard to Master
